lead_paragraph: WEISSBERG--Ruth F.,on March 16, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Herbert, Devoted mother of Steven and the late David. Adored grandmother of Logan and Alana. Donations in her memory to Hadassah or The Brotherhood Synagogue would be appreciated. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEISSBERG, RUTH F.
